name: 04-Bowtie2 2.3.4.3
description: Ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences. It is particularly good at aligning reads of about 50 up to 100s or 1,000s of characters, and particularly good at aligning to relatively long (e.g. mammalian) genomes

parameters.name: Index prefix
parameters.description: Index filename prefix (minus trailing .X.bt2). NOTE: Bowtie 1 and Bowtie 2 indexes are not compatible

parameters.name: #1 mates
parameters.description: Files with #1 mates, paired with files in <m2>. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2)

parameters.name: #2 mates
parameters.description: Files with #2 mates, paired with files in <m1>. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2)

parameters.name: Unpaired
parameters.description: Files with unpaired reads. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2)

parameters.name: Interleaved
parameters.description: Files with interleaved paired-end FASTQ reads. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2)

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: Skip (i.e. do not align) the first <int> reads or pairs in the input.

parameters.name: Only first n
parameters.description: Align the first <int> reads or read pairs from the input (after the -s/--skip reads or pairs have been skipped), then stop.

parameters.name: Trim 5'
parameters.description: Trim <int> bases from 5’ (left) end of each read before alignment (default: 0).

parameters.name: trim 3'
parameters.description: Trim <int> bases from 3’ (right) end of each read before alignment (default: 0).

parameters.name: Input is raw
parameters.description: Reads (specified with <m1>, <m2>, <s>) are files with one input sequence per line, without any other information (no read names, no qualities).

parameters.name: Phred 33
parameters.description: Input qualities are ASCII chars equal to the Phred quality plus 33.

parameters.name: Phred 64
parameters.description: Input qualities are ASCII chars equal to the Phred quality plus 64.
